author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: Amazon: *HOT* $50 Gift Cards Only $41.37 Shipped (Starbucks, Sephora, Whole Foods & More)
text:
Today only, Amazon is offering up $8.62 off a $50 purchase when you use the code BIGTHANKS at checkout. Even better, this discount appears to be working on select physical gift cards (does not work on Amazon gift cards). Here are a few deals you can scoreâ€¦
$50 Starbucks Gift Card 
Only $41.37 shipped when you use the code BIGTHANKS 
$50 Sephora Gift Card 
Only $41.37 shipped when you use the code BIGTHANKS 

$50 Whole Foods Gift Card 
Only $41.37 shipped when you use the code BIGTHANKS 
$50 Nordstrom Gift Card 
Only $41.37 shipped when you use the code BIGTHANKS 
+ More! For more information, head here .
